metadata.title: CVE-2018-11418 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in JerryScript 1.0. There is a heap-based buffer over-read in the lit_read_code_unit_from_utf8 function via a RegExp("[\\u0020") payload, related to re_parse_char_class in parser/regexp/re-parser.c.

criterions.comment: iotjs package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
